alert.note: Alert for Dent; Texas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 7:04PM CDT until May 15 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Dent County in south central Missouri... Central Texas County in south central Missouri... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 703 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 17 miles west of Raymondville to near Houston to near Cabool, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Montauk State Park, Licking, Houston, Raymondville, Huggins, Montauk, Bucyrus, Elk Creek, Success, Eunice, Yukon, Hartshorn, Solo, Simmons, Prescott and Bendavis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
